author: Moobeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: 3/10 PBE Update
text:
[ RECENT NEWS : Meddler gameplay thoughts 3/10 / Riot Pls on 2017 dev including honor update ]

[This is a  W ORK  I N  P ROGRESS POST .] [ Status : The PBE is back up and online]

The PBE has been updated! As we continue the 7.6 PBE cycle, today's update includes tentative balance changes, and more!

Continue reading for more information!

( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle! Manage your expectations accordingly.)

Table of Contents Skin Tweaks Balance Changes Notes 
Skin Tweaks [Pug maw changes]


[ Comparison ] 
Balance Changes *  Remember  *: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical or experimental changes. Be aware that what you see below may be lacking context or other changes that didn't make it in or were implemented in an earlier patch this cycle! These are  not  official notes.

Champions Aatrox 
[ context ]
Base health increased from 537.8 to 580 Dark Flight (Q) cooldown lowered from 16/15/14/13/12 to 13/12.5/12/11.5/11 Blood Thirst/Blood Price (W) damage increased from 30/60/90/120/150 to 45/80/115/150/185 
Galio [ These changes are relative to Galio's champion update .Context and changelist  from  Solcrushed . ]
Colossal Smash (Passive) Now scales off BONUS MR instead of total MR. Bonus MR Ratio lowered from 40/50/60% to 40% Base damage lowered from 10-160 to 15-100 [ new ] 40% AP ratio added Winds of War (Q) Range increased from 800 to 825 DOT base damage increased from 30/45/60/75/90 to 45/60/75/95/105 Shield of Durand (W): Time Galio can maintain the charge increased from 1.75 to 2 seconds DR linger duration lowered from 4 to 3 Hero's Entrance (R)  Channel duration increased from 0.75 to 1 (total time to land unchanged) 

Miss Fortune 
[ context ]
Double Up (Q)   Damage increased from 20/35/50/65/80 to 20/40/60/80/100 Total AD ratio increased from 85% to 100% 
Morgana 
Tormented Soil (W) [seems the new grievous wounds application when under 35% hp has been removed . This was an effect added in an earlier PBE update this cycle.] 
Shen 
Ki Barrier (Passive)  [need to look into this!] 
Items Knight's Vow 
[previous changes reverted. Meddler noted they were not intentional]  

Notes Below are a few notes and posts relating to current PBE content in 7.6 cycle. Remember that we have a few previously discussed balance change heading to PBE soon and recolors for Hextech/Enchanted Galio VFX.

1) Solcrushed provided a changelist for and context on today's Galio changes in the PBE Galio Feedback thread. 
"Tank Galio looks to be out of line both damage and durability wise, draining power out of the base numbers and putting them back to AP ratios and Q. Full tank passive damage will drop significantly while builds that feature some AP should be affected less." 
2)  Meddler noting in most recent   quick gameplay thoughts   that Knight's Vow PBE revert is not intentional:
" Aatrox hotfix    All going according to plan we should be putting out a balance hotfix for Aatrox today. We concluded he was definitely in too poor a state to leave until the next regular patch and wasn't likely to recover enough just based off relearning. Changes include increased starting health (580, was 537 and had been kept low historically because of the impact of the previous revive in lane), Q CD down (13-11, was 16-12) and W damage up (45-185, was 30-150). Suspect it's likely we'll also make Aatrox changes in 7.6, though we'll need to see where these put him first of course. " and
" Knight's Vow on PBE  We saw some reports yesterday that Knight's Vow had been reverted to its older stats and build path on the PBE yesterday. Going to be looking into that today, it's not an intended change so it's either a datamining error or we've accidentally stomped the newer version with an old file somehow."

Check out  [ THIS PAGE ]  for a  comprehensive list of the new content & changes currently on the PBE as a part of this cycle  or catch up with the individual update links below !
3/7 PBE Update: Galio champion update, new Alistar, Kennen, Kog'Maw, and Renekton skins, new chroma, and more! 3/8 PBE Update: New Skin Splash Art, New icons, & more! 3/9 PBE Update: More Tentative Balance Changes [ BACK TO TOP ]
